About Us

Askin Techlabs is solving major pain staking problems in different industries by developing Android and iOS applications for our clients. We do this by optimising the effort, accuracy and time function to the greatest extent while providing unique insights into the data that is generated by using our apps. All of this at extremely competitive costs.

Our Work

QOTI : Quality Management App.

By ascertaining whether products manufactured in your facility meet predefined thresholds and are within accepted manufacturing tolerances, to digitally logging all steps of the quality control process, Qoti presents an astute tool for real time quality unit assessment and tracking.
